topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: Yet Another Passwd 2 LDIF Converter
short_description: Yap2lc (Yet Another Passwd 2 LDIF Converter) is an LDAP migration tool, which extracts information from passwd, shadow/passwd, and master.passwd formatted files, filters out unwanted/misshapen accounts and writes an LDIF file for easy importing.
